comments:
Build ID: tptp.sdk-TPTP-4.4.0.zip

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Import the xml log with import filter.
2.Set up the filter for some time range.
3.Or use the import log set which has the time range filter as follows.


<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<logsets>
    <logset default="1" name="xml-errors">
        <LogFileElement 
        host="localhost" 
        isValid="true" 
        mergedAgent=""
            monitor="DefaultMonitor"
            parserId="org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.CommonBaseEventXMLLogParser"
            port="10002" 
            project="LogAnalyzerProject"
            selected="true"
            useLargeLogSupport="false" 
            virtualHost="localhost">
            <value id="characterEncodingField" val="DEFAULT"/>
            <value id="file_path" val="D:\logs\perf\XML20K.xml"/>
            <value id="version" val="1.0.1"/>
            <filter name="time" type="org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.ImportLogFilterType"/>
        </LogFileElement>
    </logset>
    <filters>
    <LogAnalyzerFilter name="ImportLogFilterType:time:ST">
        <whereExpression category="HierarchialLogicalExpression" operator="AND">
            <arguments category="HierarchialLogicalExpression" operator="AND">
                <arguments category="HierarchialBinaryExpression" operator="GT">
                    <leftOperand category="HierarchialSimpleOperand">
                        <feature category="Event:Attribute" href="http://www.ibm.com/AC/commonbaseevent1_0_1#//CommonBaseEvent/creationTime"/>
                    </leftOperand>
                    <rightOperands category="HierarchialSimpleOperand" rawValue="2007-08-28T09:34:36.3-0400Z"/>
                </arguments>
                <arguments category="HierarchialBinaryExpression" operator="LE">
                    <leftOperand category="HierarchialSimpleOperand">
                        <feature category="Event:Attribute" href="http://www.ibm.com/AC/commonbaseevent1_0_1#//CommonBaseEvent/creationTime"/>
                    </leftOperand>
                    <rightOperands category="HierarchialSimpleOperand" rawValue="2007-08-28T09:34:36.3-0400Z"/>
                </arguments>
            </arguments>
        </whereExpression>
    </LogAnalyzerFilter>
    <LogAnalyzerFilter name="ImportLogFilterType:time:AD"/>
</filters>
</logsets>

NullPointerException get thrown with above scenario.
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createFilterPathExpression(GLAFilterHelper.java:1048)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createStringFilterRuleType(GLAFilterHelper.java:911)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createFilterRule(GLAFilterHelper.java:619)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createFilterElement(GLAFilterHelper.java:573)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createFilterElement(GLAFilterHelper.java:558)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.createGLAFilter(GLAFilterHelper.java:110)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.getAdapter(GLAFilterHelper.java:131)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.addFilterToAdapterWithAdapterFilePath(GLAFilterHelper.java:440)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.GLAFilterHelper.addFilterToAdapter(GLAFilterHelper.java:410)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.AbstractLocalImportHandler.initialize(AbstractLocalImportHandler.java:155)
	at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard.importFromLocalHost(ImportLogWizard.java:1922)
	... 44 more

More information:
Use any xml log. Due to size log is not appended.

Praful, as discussed the filter you are generating is not valid, this is the reason why the import fails. Returning the defect. 
Reopen if neccessary.
